SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT ,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24":"MI":"SS') CREATE_DT, TO_CHAR(POST.MODIFY_DT ,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24":"MI":"SS') MODIFY_DT, READ_COUNT, LIKE_COUNT, BLOG.BLOG_NO, BLOG_TITLE, MEMBER.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM,
POST.POST_STATUS_CD, POST_STATUS_NM FROM POST JOIN BLOG ON(BLOG.BLOG_NO = POST.BLOG_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON(BLOG.MEMBER_NO = MEMBER.MEMBER_NO) JOIN POST_STATUS ON(POST.POST_STATUS_CD = POST_STATUS.POST_STATUS_CD) WHERE POST.POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND POST.POST_STATUS_CD = 500 ORDER BY CREATE_DT DESC )
